room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Amazing company!  The heist is a fun and thought-provoking room!  You will enjoy it!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I thought Escape Room in Grapevine was awesome! We did the Heist game and felt like I was in a video game with the challenging puzzles plus my group from my job was entertaining so it all worked out. PLUS, we escaped!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I went to EGD for my birthday, and literally had the best customer service I've ever seen. Never mind that the escape room itself was exceptional (we escaped from "The Heist"). When they found out it was my birthday, after we got out of the room, I was presented with a birthday card that had personalized messages from everyone on staff! Everyone made sure we had a great experience. I will definitely be coming back!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was a crazy amount of fun! I will definitely be back for more exhilarating escapes! We did the Heist, it was awesome, I want to try them all! Received excellent service, especially from Craig, Ashley, Jonathan, and Devon.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My experience was a lot of fun. The clues found were very unique. Fortunately, I was with a group of "seasoned escapees" who were familiar with the ways of Escape Rooms. We did 2 rooms. The Heist defeated us. UGH!!! It was a real challenge. Looking forward to more escapes.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My boyfriend and I had his best friends join us for The Heist. We were 4 people when it was meant for 8, but they let us do it on our own. The employees were very accommodating and nice, and the game was incredibly fun. We would have escaped given literally a few more seconds, but it was a challenge. I highly recommend this place and will go back next time I am in Dallas to try another situation.
